titles.title: Fairness in Rail Car Purchasing Act
A bill prohibiting certain pooling agreements among rail carriers for the acquisition of assets, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 3/30/1988--Introduced. Fairness in Rail Car Purchasing Act - Prohibits the Interstate Commerce Commission from approving any agreement among rail carriers regarding the joint acquisition of assets to be pooled by such carriers.
